GE07bhg4c10u:2: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:7: evaṃ tāvat saptamādibhir adhyāyair bhajanīyaṃ parameśvara-tattvaṃ nirūpitam /
GE07bhg4c10u:8: tad-vibhūtayaś ca saptame raso 'ham apsu kaunteya [Gītā 7.8] ity ādinā saṅkṣepato darśitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:9: aṣṭame ca adhiyajño 'ham evātra [Gītā 8.4] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c10u:10: navame ca ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajña [Gītā 9.16] ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c10u:11: idānīṃ tā eva vibhūtīḥ prapañcayiṣyan sva-bhakteś cāvaśya-karaṇīyatvaṃ varṇayiṣyan bhagavān uvāca bhūya eveti /
GE07bhg4c10u:12: mahāntau yuddhādi-svadharmānuṣṭhāne mahat-paricaryāyāṃ vā kuśalau bāhū yasya tathā he mahābāho /
GE07bhg4c10u:13: bhūya eva punar api me vacaḥ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c10u:16: mad-vacanāmṛtenaiva prītiṃ prāpunvate te tubhyaṃ hita-kāmyayā hitecchayā yad ahaṃ vakṣyāmi //1//
GE07bhg4c10u:18: evaṃ saptamāṣṭama-navamais tat-padārthasya bhagavatas tattvaṃ sopādhikaṃ nirupādhikaṃ ca darśitam /
GE07bhg4c10u:19: tasya ca vibhūtayaḥ sopādhikasya dhyāne nirupādhikasya jñāne copāya-bhūtā raso 'ham apsu kaunteya [Gītā 7.8] ity ādinā saptame,
GE07bhg4c10u:20: ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajña [Gītā 9.16] ity ādinā navame ca saṅkṣepeṇoktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:21: athedānīṃ tāsāṃ vistaro vaktavyo bhagavato dhyānāya tattvam api durvijṇiyatvāt punas tasya vaktavyaṃ jñānāyeti daśamo 'dhyāya ārabhyate /
GE07bhg4c10u:22: tatra prathamam arjunaṃ protsāhayitum bhūya eveti /
GE07bhg4c10u:23: bhūya eva punar api he mahābāho śṛṇu me mama paramaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:24: yat te tubhyaṃ prīyamāṇāya mad-vacanād amṛta-pānād iva prītam anubhavate vakṣyāmy ahaṃ paramāptas tava hita-kāmyayeṣṭa-prāptīcchayā //1//
GE07bhg4c10u:28: ārādhyatva-jñāna-kāraṇam aiśvaryaṃ yad eva pūrvatra saptamādiṣūktam /
GE07bhg4c10u:29: tad eva sa-viśeṣaṃ bhakti-matām ānandārthaṃ prapañcayiṣyan parokṣa-vādā ṛṣayaḥ parokṣaṃ ca mama priyam [BhP 11.21.35] iti nyāyena kiñcid durbodhatayaivāha bhūya iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:30: punar api rāja-vidyā-rāja-guhyam idam ucyate ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:32: iti yathā bāhu-balaḥ sarvādhikyena tvayā prakāśitaṃ,
GE07bhg4c10u:33: tathaivaitad buddhyā buddhi-balam api savārdhikyena prakāśayitavyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:34: śṛṇv iti śṛṇvantam api taṃ vakṣyamāṇe 'rthe samyag avadhāraṇārtham /
GE07bhg4c10u:36: te tvām ativismitīkartuṃ kriyārthopapadasya ca [Pāṇ 2.3.14] iti caturthī /
GE07bhg4c10u:42: idānīṃ tasyā utpattaye vivṛddhaye ca svāsādharaṇīḥ prāk saṃkṣipyoktāḥ sva-vibhūti-vistareṇa varṇayiṣyan bhagavān uvāca bhūya iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:44: bhūya eva punar api me paramaṃ vacaḥ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c10u:45: śṛṇvantaṃ prati śṛṇv ity uktir upadeśye 'rthe samavadhānāya /
GE07bhg4c10u:46: paramaṃ śrīmat mad-divya-vibhūti-viṣayakaṃ yad vacas te tubhyam ahaṃ hita-kāmyayā vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:48: vijñam api tvāṃ vismitaṃ kartum ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:50: te kīdṛśāyety āha prīyamāṇāyeti pīyūṣa-pānād iva mad-vākyāt prītiṃ vindate //1//
GE07bhg4c10u:52: na me viduḥ sura-gaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:53: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c10u:54: śrīdharaḥ : uktasyāpi punar vacane durjñeyatvaṃ hetum āha na me vidur iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:55: me mama prakṛṣṭaṃ bhavaṃ janma-rahitasyāpi nānā-vibhūtibhir āvirbhāvaṃ sura-gaṇā api maharṣayo 'pi bhṛgv-ādayo na jānanti /
GE07bhg4c10u:56: tatra hetuḥ -- ahaṃ hi sarva-devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ cādiḥ kāraṇam /
GE07bhg4c10u:57: sarvaśaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ utpādakatvena buddhy-ādi-pravartakatvena ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:58: ato mad-anugrahaṃ vinā māṃ ke 'pi na jānantīty arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c10u:60: prāg-bahudhoktam eva kim arthaṃ punar vakṣyasīty ata āha na me vidur iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:61: prabhavaṃ prabhāvaṃ prabhu-śakty-atiśayaṃ prabhavanam utpattim aneka-vibhūtibhir āvirbhāvaṃ vā sura-gaṇā indrādayo maharṣayaś ca bhṛgv-ādayaḥ sarvajñā api na me viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:62: teṣāṃ tad-ajñāne hetum āha ahaṃ hi yasmāt sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:63: sarvaiḥ prakārair utpādakatvena buddhyādi-pravartakatvena ca nimittatvenopādānatvena
GE07bhg4c10u:65: ato mad-vikārās te mat-prabhāvaṃ na jānantīty arthaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c10u:67: etac ca kevalaṃ mad-anugrahātiśayenaiva vedyaṃ nānyathety āha na me iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:68: mama prabhavaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ bhavaṃ devakyāṃ janma deva-gaṇā na jānanti,
GE07bhg4c10u:70: ṛṣayas tu jānīyus tatrāha na maharṣayo 'pi /
GE07bhg4c10u:71: tatra hetuḥ aham ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ sarvaśaḥ sarvair eva prakāraiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:72: na hi pitur janma-tattvaṃ putrā jānantīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:73: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavā [Gītā 10.14] ity agrimānuvādād atra prabhava-śabdasyānyārthatā na kalpyā //2//
GE07bhg4c10u:74: baladevaḥ : etac ca mad-bhaktānukampāṃ vinā durvijñānam iti bhāvavān āha na me iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:75: sura-gaṇā brahmādayo maharṣayaś ca sanakādayaḥ me prabhavaṃ prabhutvena bhavam anādi-divya-svarūpa-guṇa-vibhūti-mattayāvartanam iti yāvat na vidur na jānanti /
GE07bhg4c10u:76: kuta ity āha aham ādir iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:77: yad ahaṃ teṣām ādiḥ pūrva-kāraṇaṃ sarvaśaḥ sarvaiḥ prakārair utpādakatayā buddhy-ādi-dātṛtayā cety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:78: devatvādikam aiśvaryādikaṃ ca mayaiva tebhyas tat-tad-ārādhana-tuṣṭena datta-mataḥ sva-pūrva-siddhaṃ māṃ mad-aiśvaryaṃ ca te na viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:80: ko addhā veda ka iha prāvocat
GE07bhg4c10u:81: kuta ā jātā kuta iyaṃ visṛṣṭiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:83: athā ko veda yata ābabhūva [Rv 8.7.17, Taitt.Br. 2.8.9.76] iti,
GE07bhg4c10u:84: naitad devā āpnuvan pūrvam arśat iti caivam ādyā //2//
GE07bhg4c10u:86: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram
GE07bhg4c10u:88: śrīdharaḥ : evambhūtātma-jñāne phalam āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:89: sarva-kāraṇatvād eva na vidyata ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya tam anādim /
GE07bhg4c10u:90: ataevājaṃ janma-śūnyaṃ lokānāṃ maheśvaraṃ ca māṃ yo vetti sa manuṣyeṣv asaṃmūḍhaḥ saṃmoha-rahitaḥ san sarva-pāpaiḥ pramucyate //3//
GE07bhg4c10u:92: mahāphalatvāc ca kaścid eva bhagavataḥ prabhāvaṃ vettīty āha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:93: sarva-kāraṇatvān na vidyata ādiḥ kāraṇaṃ yasya tam anādim anāditvād ajaṃ janma-śūnyaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:94: lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ ca māṃ yo vetti sa martyeṣu madhye 'saṃmūḍhaḥ saṃmoha-varjitaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:95: sarvaiḥ pāpair mati-pūrva-kṛtair api pramucyate prakarṣeṇa kāraṇocchedāt tat-saṃskārābhāva-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:98: nanu para-brahmaṇaḥ sarva-deśa-kālāparicchinnasya tavaitad dehasyaiva janma devā ṛṣayaś ca jānanty eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:99: tatra sva-tarjanyā sva-vakṣaḥ spṛṣṭvāha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:101: kiṃ parameṣṭhinaṃ na anādiṃ satyaṃ tarhi anāditvād ajam ajanyaṃ parmātmānaṃ tvāṃ vetty eva tatrāha ceti /
GE07bhg4c10u:102: ajam ajanyaṃ vasudeva-janyaṃ ca mām anādim eva yo vetti ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:103: mām iti padena vasudeva-janyatvaṃ budhyate janma karma ca me divyam [Gītā 4.9] iti mad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:104: mama janmavattvaṃ paramātmatvāt sadaivājatvaṃ ca ity ubhayam api me paramaṃ satyaṃ acintya-śakti-siddham eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:105: yad uktaṃ ajo 'pi sann avyayātmāà sambhavāmi [Gītā 4.6] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:106: tathā coddhava-vākyaṃ karmāṇy anīhasya bhavo 'bhavasya te ity ādy-anantaraṃ khidyati dhīr vidām iha [BhP 3.4.16] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:108: tat tan na vāstavaṃ cet syād vidāṃ buddhi-bhramas tadā /
GE07bhg4c10u:109: na syād evety ato 'cintyā śaktir līlāsu kāraṇam // [LBhāg 1.5.119]
GE07bhg4c10u:110: tasmād yathā mama bālye dāmodaratva-līlāyām ekadaiva kiṅkiṇyā bandhanāt paricchinnatvaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:111: dāmnā svābandhād aparicchinnatvaṃ cātarkyam eva tathaiva mamājatva-janmavattve cātarkye eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:112: durbodham aiśvaryaṃ cāha loka-maheśvaraṃ tava sārathim api sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ yo veda sa eva martyeṣu madhye asaṃmūḍhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:114: yas tu ajatvānāditva-sarveśvaratvāny eva vāstavāni syur janmavattvādīni tu anukaraṇa-mātra-siddhānīti vyācaṣṭe /
GE07bhg4c10u:115: sa saṃmūḍha eva sarva-pāpair na pramucyata ity arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c10u:116: baladevaḥ : idaṃ tādṛśa-mad-viṣayakaṃ jñānaṃ kasyacid eva bhavatīti bhāvenāha yo mām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:117: martyeṣu yatamāneṣv api sahasreṣu madhye yo yādṛcchika-mattatvavit sat-prasaṅgī kaścij jano mām anādim ajaṃ loka-maheśvaraṃ ca vetti /
GE07bhg4c10u:119: atra ajam ity anena pradhānād acid-vargāt saṃsāri-vargāc ca bhedaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:121: anādim ity anena viśesite tu mukta-cid-vargāc ca bhedas tasyājatvam ādima-deva-deha-sambandhena
GE07bhg4c10u:122: janmitvasya pūrva-vṛttitvāt loka-maheśvaram ity anena nitya-mukta-cid-vargāt prakṛti-kālābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:123: ca bhedas teṣām anādy-ajatve saty api loka-maheśvaratvābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:124: punar anādima ity anena viśeṣite vidhi-rudrādibhyāṃ ca bhedas tayor loka-maheśvaratāyāḥ sāditvāt sarvaiśvareṇaiva tayoḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:126: itthaṃ ca sarvadā heya-sambandhābhāvān nitya-siddha-sārvaiśvaryāc ca sarvetara-vilakṣaṇaṃ yo vetti,
GE07bhg4c10u:127: sa mad-bhakty-utpatti-pratīpair nikhilaiḥ karmabhir vimukto mad-bhaktiṃ vindati /
GE07bhg4c10u:129: na ca devakyāṃ jātasya te katham ajatvaṃ tasyām ajatvam avihāyaiva jātatvāt //3//
GE07bhg4c10u:131: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:132: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca //4//
GE07bhg4c10u:133: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:134: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c10u:135: śrīdharaḥ : loka-maheśvaratām eva sphuṭayati buddhir iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:149: asya ślokasya matta eva bhavatīty uttareṇānvayaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c10u:158: ete buddhir jñānam ity ādayas tad-viparītāś cābuddhy-ādayo nānā-vidhā bhāvāḥ prāṇināṃ matto mat-sakāśād eva bhavanti //5//
GE07bhg4c10u:160: ātmano loka-maheśvaratvaṃ prapañcayati buddhir iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c10u:163: asaṃmohaḥ pratyutpanneṣu bodhavyeṣu kartavyeṣu vyākulatayā vivekena pravṛttiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:183: dānaṃ deśe kāle śraddhayā yathā-śakty-arthānāṃ sat-pātre samarpaṇam /
GE07bhg4c10u:186: ete buddhy-ādayo bhāvāḥ kārya-viśeṣāḥ sa-kāraṇakāḥ pṛthag-vidhā dharmādharmādi-sādhana-vaicitryeṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:187: nānā-vidhā bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ mattaḥ parameśvarād eva bhavanti nānyasmāt
GE07bhg4c10u:188: tasmāt kiṃ vācyaṃ mama loka-maheśvaratvam ity arthaḥ //5 //
GE07bhg4c10u:190: na ca śāstra-jñāḥ sva-buddhy-ādibhir mattatvaṃ jñātuṃ śaknuvanti,
GE07bhg4c10u:191: yato buddhy-ādīnāṃ sattvādivan-māyā-guṇa-janyatvān matta eva jātānām api guṇātīte mayi nāsti svataḥ praveśayogyatety āha buddhiḥ sūkṣmārtha-niścaya-sāmarthyam
GE07bhg4c10u:194: ete trayo bhāvā mat-tattva-jñāna-hetutvena sambhāvyamānā iva,
GE07bhg4c10u:196: prasaṅgād anyān api bhāvān lokeṣu dṛṣṭān na svata evodbhūtān āha kṣamā sahiṣṇutvam /
GE07bhg4c10u:213: matta iti ete man-māyāto bhavanto 'pi śakti-śaktimator aikyāt matta eva //4-5//
GE07bhg4c10u:214: baladevaḥ : athātmanaḥ sarvāditvaṃ sarveśvaratvaṃ ca prapañcayati buddhir iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c10u:233: tad-viparītaṃ ayaśaḥ evam ādayo bhāvā bhūtānāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:234: deva-mānavādīnāṃ matto mat-saṅkalpād eva bhavantīty aham eva teṣāṃ hetur ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:237: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
GE07bhg4c10u:238: mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c10u:240: sapta maharṣayo bhṛgv-ādayaḥ sapta brahmāṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ [Mbh 12.201.5] ity ādi purāṇa-prasiddhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:241: tebhyo 'pi pūrve anye catvāro maharṣayaḥ sanakādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:243: mad-bhāvā madīyo bhāvaḥ prabhāvo yeṣu te /
GE07bhg4c10u:246: yeṣāṃ bhṛgv-ādīnāṃ sanakādīnāṃ manūnāṃ cemā brāhmaṇādyā loke vardhamānā yathāyathaṃ putra-pautrādi-rūpāḥ śiṣa-praśiṣyādi-rūpāś ca prajā jātāḥ pravartante //6//
GE07bhg4c10u:249: maharṣayo veda-tad-artha-draṣṭāraḥ sarvajñā vidyā-sampradāya-pravartakā bhṛgv-ādyāḥ sapta pūrve sargādya-kālāvirbhūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:251: bhṛguṃ marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum /
GE07bhg4c10u:252: vasiṣṭhaṃ ca mahātejāḥ so 'sṛjan manasā sutān /
GE07bhg4c10u:253: sapta brahmaṇa ity ete purāṇe niścayaṃ gatāḥ // iti /[*ENDNOTE] [Mbh 12.201.4-5]
GE07bhg4c10u:254: tathā catvāro manavaḥ sāvarṇā iti prasiddhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:256: tebhyo 'pi pūrve prathamāś catvāraḥ sanakādyā maharṣayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:257: manavas tathā svāyambhuvādayaś caturdaśa mayi parameśvare bhāvo bhāvanā yeṣāṃ te mad-bhāvā mac-cintana-parā mad-bhāvanāvaśād āvīribhūta-madīya-jñānaiśvarya-śaktaya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:258: mānasā manasaḥ saṅkalpād evotpannā na tu yonijāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:259: ato viśuddha-janmatvena sarva-prāṇi-śreṣṭhā matta eva hiraṇyagarbhātmano jātāḥ sargādya-kāle prādurbhūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:260: yeṣāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ saptānāṃ bhṛgv-ādīnāṃ catūrṇāṃ ca sanakādīnāṃ manūnāṃ ca caturdaśānām asmin loke janmanā ca vidyayā ca santati-bhūtā imā brāhmaṇādyāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c10u:263: āha maharṣayaḥ sapta marīcy-ādayas tebhyo 'pi pūrve 'nye catvāraḥ sanakādayo manavaś
GE07bhg4c10u:264: caturdaśa svāyambhuvādayo matta eva hiraṇyagarbhātmanaḥ sakāśād bhavo janma yeṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:265: marīcy-ādīnāṃ sanakādīnāṃ cemā brāhmaṇādyā loke vartamānāḥ prajāḥ putra-pautrādi-rūpāḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:267: baladevaḥ : itaś caitad evam ity āha maharṣaya iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:268: sapta bhṛgv-ādayas tebhyo 'pi pūrve prathamāś catvāraḥ sanakādaya ekādaśaite maharṣayas
GE07bhg4c10u:269: tathā manavaś caturdaśa svāyambhuvādaya evaṃ pañcaviṃśatir ete mānasā hiraṇyagarbhātmano
GE07bhg4c10u:270: mama manaḥ-prabhṛtyebhyo jātā mad-bhāvā mac-cintana-parās tat-prabhāvenopalabdha-maj-jñānaiśvarya-śaktaya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:271: yeṣāṃ bhṛgv-ādīnāṃ pañcaviṃśater imā brāhmaṇa-kṣatriyādayaḥ prajā janmanā vidyayā ca santati-rūpā bhavanti //6//
GE07bhg4c10u:273: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:275: śrīdharaḥ : yathokta-vibhūty-ādi-tattva-jñānasya phalam āha etām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:279: so 'vikalpena niḥsaṃśayena yogena samyag-darśanena yukto bhavati nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c10u:281: evaṃ sopādhikasya bhagavataḥ prabhāvam uktvā taj-jñāna-phalam āha etām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:282: etāṃ prāg uktāṃ buddhy-ādi-maharṣy-ādi-rūpāṃ vibhūtiṃ vividha-bhāvaṃ tat-tad-rūpeṇāvasthitiṃ yogaṃ ca tat-tad-artha-nirmāṇa-sāmarthyaṃ paramaiśvaryam iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c10u:283: mama yo vetti tattvato yathāvat so 'vikampenāpracalitena yogena samyag-jñāna-sthairya-lakṣaṇena samādhinā yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ pratibandhaḥ kaścit //7//
GE07bhg4c10u:285: kintu bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ [BhP 11.14.11] iti mad-ukter mad-ananya-bhakta eva
GE07bhg4c10u:286: mat-prasādān mad-vāci dṛḍham āstikyaṃ dadhāno mat-tattvaṃ vettīty āha etāṃ saṅkṣepeṇaiva
GE07bhg4c10u:287: vakṣyamāṇāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ bhakti-yogaṃ ca yas tattvato vetti /
GE07bhg4c10u:288: mat-prabhoḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya vākyatvād idam eva paramaṃ tattvam iti dṛḍhatarāstikyavān eva yo vetti saḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:289: avikalpena niścalena yogena mat-tattva-jñāna-lakṣaṇena yujyate yukto bhaved atra nāsti ko 'pi sandehaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c10u:293: yogam anādy-ajatvādibhiḥ kalyāṇa-guṇa-ratnair mama sambandhaṃ ca yo vetti sarveśvareṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:294: sarvajñena vāsudevenopadiṣṭam idaṃ tāttvikaṃ bhavatīti dṛḍha-viśvāsena yo gṛhṇāti
GE07bhg4c10u:295: sa avikalpena sthireṇa yogena mad-bhakti-lakṣaṇena yujyate sampanno bhavati /
GE07bhg4c10u:296: etādṛśatayā maj-jñānaṃ mad-bhakter utpādakaṃ vivardhakaṃ ceti bhāvaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c10u:298: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate /
GE07bhg4c10u:300: śrīdharaḥ : yathā ca vibhūti-yogayor jñānena samyag-jñānāvāptis tad darśayati aham ity ādi-caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:302: matta eva ca sarvasya buddhir jñānam asaṃmoha ity ādi sarvaṃ pravartata iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:303: evaṃ matvāvabudhya budhā vivekino bhāva-samanvitāḥ prīti-yuktā māṃ bhajante //8//
GE07bhg4c10u:305: yādṛśena vibhūti-yogayor jñānenāvikampa-yoga-prāptis tad darśayati aham ity ādi-caturbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:306: ahaṃ paraṃ brahma vāsudevākhyaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhava utpatti-kāraṇam upādānaṃ nimittaṃ ca sthiti-nāśādi ca sarvaṃ satta eva pravartate bhavati /
GE07bhg4c10u:307: mayaivāntaryāmiṇā sarvajñena sarva-śaktinā preryamāṇaṃ sva-sva-maryādām anatikramya sarvaṃ jagat pravartate ceṣṭata iti vā /
GE07bhg4c10u:308: ity evaṃ matvā budhā vivekenāvagata-tattva-bhāvena paramārtha-tattva-grahaṇaa-rūpeṇa premṇā samanvitāḥ santo māṃ bhajante //8//
GE07bhg4c10u:310: tatra mahaiśvarya-lakṣaṇāṃ vibhūtim āha ahaṃ sarvasya prākṛtāprākṛta-vastu-mātrasya prabhavaḥ utpatti-prādurbhāvayor hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:311: matta evāntaryāmi-svarūpāt sarvaṃ jagat pravartate cesṭate /
GE07bhg4c10u:312: tathā matta eva nāradādy-avatarātmakāt sarvaṃ bhakti-jñāna-tapaḥ-karmādikaṃ sādhanaṃ tat tat sādhyaṃ ca pravṛttaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c10u:313: aikāntika-bhakti-lakṣaṇaṃ yogam āha iti matvā āstikyato jñānena niścitya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:315: baladevaḥ : atha catuḥślokyā paramaikāntināṃ bhaktiṃ bruvan tasyā janakaṃ poṣakaṃ cātma-yāthātmyaṃ tāvad āha aham iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:316: svayaṃ bhagavān kṛṣṇo 'haṃ sarvasyāsya vidhi-rudra-pramukhasya prapañcasya prabhavo hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:317: evam evātharvasu paṭhyate - yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃś ca gāpayati sma kṛṣṇaḥ [GTU 1.22] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:318: atha puruṣo ha vai nārāyaṇo 'kāmayata prajāḥ sṛjaye ity upakramya nārāyaṇād brahmā
GE07bhg4c10u:319: jāyate nārāyaṇāt prajāpatiḥ prajāyate nārāyaṇād indro jāyate nārāyaṇād aṣṭau vasavo
GE07bhg4c10u:320: jāyante nārāyaṇād ekādaśa rudrā jāyante nārāyaṇād dvādaśādityāḥ ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c10u:321: eṣa nārāyaṇaḥ kṛṣṇo bodhyaḥ brahmaṇyo devakī-putraḥ ity ādy-uttara-pāṭhāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:322: tad āhuḥ - eko vai nārāyaṇa āsīn na brahmā na īśāno nāpo nāgī
GE07bhg4c10u:323: samau neme dyāv-āpṛthivī na nakṣatrāṇi na sūryaḥ sa ekākī na ramate tasya dhyānāntaḥsthasya
GE07bhg4c10u:324: yatra chāndogaiḥ kriyamāṇāṣṭakādi-saṃjñakā stuti-stomaḥ stomam ucyate ity ādy upakramya
GE07bhg4c10u:325: pradhānādi-sṛṣṭim abhidhāyātha punar eva nārāyaṇaḥ so 'nyat kāmo manasā dhyāyata
GE07bhg4c10u:326: tasya dhyānātaḥsthasya tal-lalāṭāttrakṣyaḥ śūlapāṇiḥ puruṣo 'jāyata bibhrac chriyaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:328: tatra catur-mukho jāyate ity ādi ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:329: ṛkṣu ca yaṃ kāmaye taṃ tam ugraṃ kṛṣṇomi taṃ brahmāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ taṃ sumedhasam ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c10u:331: prajāpatiṃ ca rudraṃ cāpy aham eva sṛjāmi vai /
GE07bhg4c10u:332: tau hi māṃ vijānīto mama māyā-vimohitau // iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:334: nārāyaṇaḥ paro devas tasmāj jātaś caturmukhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:335: tasmād rudro 'bhavad devaḥ sa ca sarvajñatāṃ gataḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:337: iti matvā mamedṛśatvaṃ sad-guru-mukhān niścitya bhāvena premṇā samanvitāḥ santo budhā māṃ bhajante //8//
GE07bhg4c10u:340: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca //9//
GE07bhg4c10u:341: śrīdharaḥ : prīti-pūrvakaṃ bhajanam āha mac-cittā iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:342: mayy eva cittaṃ yeṣāṃ te mac-cittāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:343: mām eva gatāḥ prāptāḥ prāṇā indriyāṇi yeṣāṃ te mad-gata-prāṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:345: evaṃbhūtās te budhā anyonyaṃ māṃ nyāyopetaiḥ śruty-ādi-pramāṇair bodhayanto buddhyā ca māṃ kathayantaḥ saṅkīrtayantaḥ santas te nityaṃ tuṣyanty anumodanena tuṣṭiṃ yānti /
GE07bhg4c10u:348: prema-pūrvakaṃ bhajanam eva vivṛṇoti mac-cittā iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:349: mayi bhagavati cittaṃ yeṣāṃ te mac-cittāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:350: tathā mad-gatā māṃ prāptāḥ prāṇāś cakṣur-ādayo yeṣāṃ te mad-gata-prāṇāḥ mad-bhajana-nimitta-cakṣur-ādi-vyāpārā mayy upasaṃhṛta-sarva-karaṇā vā /
GE07bhg4c10u:351: athavā mad-gata-prāṇā mad-bhajanārtha-jīvanā mad-bhajanātirikta-prayojana-śūnya-jīvanā iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c10u:352: vidvad-goṣṭhīṣu parasparam anyonyaṃ śrutibhir yuktibhiś ca mām eva bodhayantas tattva-bubhutsu-kathayā jñāpayantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:353: tathā sva-śiṣyebhyaś ca mām eva kathayanta upadiśantaś ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:354: mayi cittārpaṇaṃ tathā bāhya-karaṇārpaṇaṃ tathā jīvanārpaṇam evaṃ samānām anyonyaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:355: mad-bodhanaṃ sva-nyūnebhyaś ca mad-upadeśanam ity evaṃ rūpaṃ yan mad-bhajanaṃ tenaiva tuṣyanti ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:357: vayam alam anyena labdhavyenety evaṃ-pratyaya-rūpaṃ santoṣaṃ prāpnuvanti ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:358: tena santoṣeṇa ramanti ca raante ca priya-saṃgamenevottamaṃ sukham anubhavanti ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:359: tad uktaṃ patañjalinā santoṣād anuttamaḥ sukha-lābhaḥ [Ys 2.42] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:361: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham /
GE07bhg4c10u:365: etādṛśā ananya-bhaktā eva mat-prasādāl labdha-buddhi-yogaḥ pūrvokta-lakṣaṇaṃ durbodham
GE07bhg4c10u:366: api mat-tattva-jñānaṃ prāpnuvantīty āha mac-cittā mad-rūpa-nāma-guṇa-līlā-mādhuryāsvādeṣv eva lubdha-manaso,
GE07bhg4c10u:367: mad-gata-prāṇā māṃ vinā prāṇān dhartum asamarthā anna-gata-prāṇā narā itivat /
GE07bhg4c10u:369: māṃ mahā-madhura-rūpa-guṇa-līlā-mahodadhiṃ kathayanto mad-rūpādi-vyākhyānenot-kīrtanādikaṃ kurvanta ity evaṃ sarva-bhaktiṣv atiśraiṣṭhyāt smaraṇa-śravaṇa-kīrtanāny uktāni /
GE07bhg4c10u:370: tuṣyanti ca ramanti ceti bhaktyaiva santoṣaś ca ramaṇaṃ ceti rahasyam /
GE07bhg4c10u:371: yad vā sādhana-daśāyām api bhāgya-vaśāt bhajane nirvighne sampadyamāne sati tuṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c10u:372: tadaiva bhāvi-svīya-sādhya-daśām anusmṛtya ramanti ca manasā
GE07bhg4c10u:373: sva-prabhuṇā saha ramanti ceti rāgānugā bhaktir dyotitā //9//
GE07bhg4c10u:374: baladevaḥ : bhaktiḥ prakāram āha mac-cittā iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:375: mac-cittā mat-smṛti-parā mad-gata-prāṇā māṃ vinā prāṇān dhartum akṣamā mīnā vināmbhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:376: parasparaṃ mad-rūpa-guṇa-lāvaṇyādi bodhayantas tathā māṃ sva-bhakta-vātsalya-nīradhim
GE07bhg4c10u:377: ativicitra-caritaṃ kathayantaś cety evaṃ smaraṇa-śravaṇa-kīrtana-lakṣaṇair bhajanaiḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:379: tathaiva teṣv eva ramante ca yuvati-smita-kaṭākṣāny uktāni /
GE07bhg4c10u:380: tuṣyanti ca ramanti ceti bhaktyaiva santoṣaś ca ramaṇaṃ ceti rahasyam /
GE07bhg4c10u:381: yad vā sādhana-daśāyām api bhāgya-vaśāt bhajane nirvighne sampadyamāne sati tuṣyanti /
GE07bhg4c10u:382: tadaiva bhāvi-svīya-sādhya-daśām anusmṛtya ramanti ca manasā sva-prabhuṇā saha ramanti ceti rāgānugā bhaktir dyotitā //9//
GE07bhg4c10u:385: dadāmi buddhi-yogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te //10//
GE07bhg4c10u:386: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃbhūtānāṃ ca samyag-jñānam ahaṃ dadāmīty āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:387: evaṃ satata-yuktānāṃ mayy āsakta-cittānāṃ prīti-pūrvakaṃ bhajatāṃ teṣāṃ taṃ buddhi-rūpaṃ yogam upāyaṃ dadāmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:388: tam iti kam ? yenopāyena te mad-bhaktā māṃ prāpnuvanti //10//
GE07bhg4c10u:390: ye yathoktena prakāreṇa bhajante māṃ teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:392: ataeva lābha-pūjā-khyāty-ādy anabhisandhāya prīti-pūrvakam eva bhajatāṃ sevamānānāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:393: teṣām avikampena yogeneti yaḥ prāg uktas taṃ buddhi-yogaṃ mattatva-viṣayaṃ samyag-darśanaṃ dadāmi utpādayāmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:394: yena buddhi-yogena mām īśvaram ātmatvenopayānti ye mac-cittatvādi-prakārair māṃ bhajante te //10//
GE07bhg4c10u:396: nanu tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca iti tvad-uktyā tvad-bhaktānāṃ bhaktyaiva paramānando guṇātīta ity avagataṃ,
GE07bhg4c10u:398: sa ca kutaḥ sakāśāt tair avagantavya ity apekṣāyām āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:399: satata-yuktānāṃ nityam eva mat-saṃyogākāṅkṣaṇāṃ taṃ buddhi-yogaṃ dadāmi teṣāṃ hṛd-vṛttiṣv aham eva udbhāvayāmīti /
GE07bhg4c10u:400: sa buddhi-yogaḥ svato 'nyasmāc ca kutaścid apy adhigantum aśakyaḥ kintu mad-eka-deyas tad-eka-grāhya iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:401: mām upayānti mām upalabhante sākṣān man-nikaṭaṃ prāpnuvanti //10//
GE07bhg4c10u:402: baladevaḥ : nanu svarūpeṇa guṇair vibhūtibhiś cānantaṃ tvāṃ kathaṃ gurūpadeśa-mātreṇa te grahītuṃ kṣamerann iti cet tatrāha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:403: satata-yuktānāṃ nityaṃ mad-yogaṃ vāñchatāṃ prīti-pūrvakaṃ mama yāthātmya-jñānajena ruci-bhareṇa bhajatāṃ taṃ buddhi-yogaṃ sva-bhakti-rasiko dadāmy arpayāmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:404: yena te mām upayānti tad-buddhiṃ tathāham udbhāvayāmi yathānanta-guṇa-vibhūtiṃ mām gṛhītvopāsya ca prāpnuvanti //10//
GE07bhg4c10u:408: śrīdharaḥ : buddhi-yogaṃ dattvā ca tasyānubhava-paryantaṃ tam āviṣkṛtyāvidyā-kṛtaṃ saṃsāraṃ nāśayāmīty āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:409: teṣām anukampārtham anugrahārtham evājñānāj jātaṃ tamaḥ saṃsārākhyaṃ nāśayāmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:410: kutra sthitaḥ san kena vā sādhanena tamo nāśayasi ?
GE07bhg4c10u:411: ata āha ātma-bhāva-stho buddhi-vṛttau sthitaḥ san /
GE07bhg4c10u:414: dīyamānasya buddhi-yogasyātma-prāptau phalaṃ madhya-vartinaṃ vyāpāram āha teṣām iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:415: teṣām eva kathaṃ śreyaḥ syād ity anugrahārtham ātma-bhāvasya ātmākārāntaḥ-karaṇa-vṛttau
GE07bhg4c10u:416: viṣayatvena sthito 'haṃ sva-prakāśa-caitanyānandādvaya-lakṣaṇa ātmā tenaiva mad-viṣayāntaḥkaraṇa-pariṇāma-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:417: jñāna-dīpena dīpa-sadṛśena jñānena bhāsvatā cid-ābhāsa-yuktenāpratibaddhena ajñāna-jam
GE07bhg4c10u:418: ajñānopādānakaṃ tamo mithyā-pratyaya-lakṣaṇaṃ sva-viṣayāvaraṇam andhakāraṃ tad-upādānājñāna-nāśena
GE07bhg4c10u:420: yathā dīpenāndhakāre nivartanīye dīpotpattim antareṇa na karmaṇo 'bhyāsasya vāpekṣā
GE07bhg4c10u:421: vidyamānasyaivaa ca vastuno 'bhivyaktis tato nānutpannasya kasyacid utpattis tathā
GE07bhg4c10u:422: jñānenājñāne nivartanīye na jñānotpattim antareṇānyasya karmaṇo 'bhyāsasya vāpekṣā
GE07bhg4c10u:423: vidyamānasyaiva ca brahma-bhāvasya mokṣasyābhivyaktis tato nānutpannasyotpattir yena
GE07bhg4c10u:424: kṣayitvaṃ karmādi-sāpekṣatvaṃ vā bhaved iti rūpakālaṅkāreṇa sūcito 'rthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:425: bhāsvatety anena tīvra-pavanāder ivāsaṃbhāvanādeḥ pratibandhakasyābhāvaḥ sūcitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:426: jñānasya ca dīpa-sādharmyaṃ sva-viṣayāvaraṇa-nivartakatvaṃ sva-vyavahāre sajātīya-parānapekṣatvaṃ svotpatty-atirikta-sahakāry-anapekṣatvam ity ādi rūpaka-bījaṃ draṣṭavyam //11//
GE07bhg4c10u:428: nanu ca vidyādi-vṛttiṃ vinā kathaṃ tvad-adhigamaḥ ?
GE07bhg4c10u:429: tasmāt tair api tad-arthaṃ yatanīyam eva ?
GE07bhg4c10u:430: tatra nahi nahīty āha teṣām eva na tv anyeṣāṃ yoginām anukapārthaṃ mad-anukampā yena prakāreṇa syāt tad-artham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:431: tair mad-anukampā-prāptau kāpi cintā na kāryā yatas teṣāṃ mad-anukampā-prāpty-artham aham eva yatamāno varta eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:433: jñānaṃ mad-eka-prakāśyatvān na sāttvikaṃ nirguṇatve 'pi bhakty-uttha-jñānato 'pi vilakṣaṇaṃ yat tad eva dīpas tena /
GE07bhg4c10u:434: aham eva nāśayāmīti taiḥ kathaṃ tad-arthaṃ prayatanīyam ?
GE07bhg4c10u:435: teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yoga-kṣemaṃ vahāmy ahaṃ [Gītā 9.22] iti mad-uktes teṣāṃ vyavahārikaḥ pāramārthikaś ca sarvo 'pi bhāro mayā voḍham aṅgīkṛta eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:438: baladevaḥ : nanu cirantanasyāvidyā-timirasya sattvāt teṣāṃ hṛdi kathaṃ tat-prakāśaḥ syād iti cet tatrāha teṣām eveti /
GE07bhg4c10u:439: teṣām eva māṃ vinā prāṇān dhartum asamarthānāṃ mad-ekāntinām eva,
GE07bhg4c10u:441: aham evātma-bhāvastho 'ravinda-koṣe bhṛṅga iva tad-bhāve sthito divya-svarūpa-guṇāṃs
GE07bhg4c10u:442: tatra prakāśayaṃs tad-viṣayaka-jñāna-rūpeṇa bhāsvatā dīpena jñāna-virodhy-anādi-karma-rūpājñāna-jaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:444: teṣām ekānta-bhāvena prasādito 'haṃ yoga-kṣemavad buddhi-vṛtter udbhāvanaṃ tad-varti-tamo-vināśaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:445: ca karomīti tat-sarva-nirvāha-bhāro mamaiveti na taiḥ kutrāpy arthe prayatitavyam ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c10u:450: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān /
GE07bhg4c10u:451: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum //12//
GE07bhg4c10u:452: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā /
GE07bhg4c10u:453: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me //13//
GE07bhg4c10u:454: śrīdharaḥ :saṃkṣepeṇoktāṃ vibhūtiṃ vistareṇa jijñāsuḥ bhagavantaṃ stuvann arjuna uvāca paraṃ brahmeti saptabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:456: paramaṃ ca pavitraṃ ca bhavān eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:457: kuta iti ? ata āha yataḥ śāśvataṃ nityaṃ puruṣam /
GE07bhg4c10u:464: ke ta iti ? āha āhur iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:467: asitaś ca devalaś ca vyāsaś ca svayaṃ tvam eva ca sākṣān me mahyaṃ bravīṣi //12-13//
GE07bhg4c10u:469: evaṃ bhagavato vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca śrutvā paramotkaṇṭhito 'rjuna uvāca paraṃ brahmeti saptabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:470: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma āśrayaḥ prakāśo vā /
GE07bhg4c10u:471: paramaṃ pavitraṃ pāvanaṃ ca bhavān eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:472: yataḥ puruṣam paramātmānaṃ śāśvataṃ sadaika-rūpaṃ divi parame vyomni sva-svarūpe
GE07bhg4c10u:473: bhavaṃ divyaṃ sva-prapañcātītam ādiṃ ca sarva-kāraṇaṃ devaṃ ca dyotanātmakaṃ sva-prakāśam
GE07bhg4c10u:474: ādi-devam ata evājaṃ vibhuṃ sarva-gataṃ tvām āhur iti sambandhaḥ //12 //
GE07bhg4c10u:475: āhuḥ kathayanti tvām ananta-mahimānam ṛṣayas tattva-jñāna-niṣṭhāḥ sarve bhṛgu-vaśiṣṭhādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:476: tathā devarṣi-nārado 'sito devalaś ca dhaumyasya jyeṣṭho bhrātā /
GE07bhg4c10u:478: ete 'pi tvāṃ pūrvokta-viśeṣaṇaṃ me mahyam āhuḥ sākṣāt kim anyair vaktṛbhiḥ svayam eva tvaṃ ca mahyaṃ bravīṣi /
GE07bhg4c10u:479: atra ṛṣitve 'pi sākṣād-vaktṝṇāṃ nāradādīnām ativiśiṣṭatvāt pṛthag-grahaṇam //13//
GE07bhg4c10u:481: saṅkṣepeṇoktam arthaṃ vistareṇa śrotum icchan stuti-pūrvakam āha param iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:482: paraṃ sarvotkṛṣṭaṃ dhāma śyāmasundaraṃ vapur eva paraṃ brahma /
GE07bhg4c10u:487: paraṃ pavitraṃ draṣṭṝṇām avidyā-mālinya-haram ataeva ṛṣayo 'pi tvāṃ śāśvataṃ puruṣam āhuḥ puruṣākārasyāsya nityatvaṃ vadanti //12-13//
GE07bhg4c10u:488: baladevaḥ : saṅkṣepeṇa śrutāṃ vibhūtiṃ vistareṇa śrotum icchann arjuna uvāca param iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:489: bhavān eva satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma iti śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ brahma /
GE07bhg4c10u:490: bhavān eva tasminn evāśritāḥ sarve tad u nātyeti kaścana iti śrūyamāṇaṃ paraṃ dhāma nikhilāśraya-bhūtaṃ vastu /
GE07bhg4c10u:491: bhavān eva paramaṃ pavitraṃ jñātvā devaṃ mucyate sarva-pāpaiḥ sarvaṃ pāpmānaṃ tarati nainaṃ pāpmā tarati ity ādi śrūyamāṇaṃ smartur akhila-pāpa-haraṃ vastu ity ahaṃ vedmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:492: tathā sarve tad-anukampitā ṛṣayas teṣu pradhāna-bhūtā nāradādayaś ca tasmāt kṛṣṇa eva paro devas taṃ dhyāyet taṃ raset taṃ bhajet taṃ yajet [GTU 1.48] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:493: oṃ tat sat iti janma-jarābhyāṃ bhinnaḥ sthāṇur ayam acchedyo 'yaṃ [GTU 2.22] iti śruty-artha-vidas tvāṃ divyaṃ puruṣam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum āhus [Gītā
GE07bhg4c10u:494: 10.12] tat-kathā-saṃvādeṣu purāṇeṣv itihāseṣu ca svayaṃ ca vravīṣīti ajo 'pi sann
GE07bhg4c10u:495: avyayātmā [Gītā 4.6] iti yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca [Gītā 10.3] iti ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:498: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava /
GE07bhg4c10u:499: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c10u:500: śrīdharaḥ : ato mamedānīṃ tvadīyaiśvaryo 'sambhāvanā nivṛttety āha sarvam etad iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:501: etad-bhāvena paraṃ brahmety ādi sarvam apy ṛtaṃ satyaṃ manye /
GE07bhg4c10u:502: yan māṃ prati tvaṃ kathayasi na me viduḥ sura-gaṇā ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c10u:503: tad api satyam eva manya ity āha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c10u:504: he bhagavan tava vyaktiṃ devā na viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:505: asmad-anugrahārtham iyam abhivyaktir iti na jānanti /
GE07bhg4c10u:506: dānavāś cāsmin nigrahārtham iti na vidur eveti //14//
GE07bhg4c10u:508: sarvam etad uktam ṛṣibhiś ca tvayā ca tad-ṛtaṃ satyam evāhaṃ manye yan māṃ prati vadasi keśava /
GE07bhg4c10u:510: tac ca sarvajñatvāt tvaṃ jānāsīti keśau brahma-rudrau sarveśāv apy anukampyayā vātyavagacchatīti vyutpattim āśritya niratiśayaiśvarya-pratipādakena keśava-padena sūcitam /
GE07bhg4c10u:511: ato yad uktaṃ na me viduḥ sura-gaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ [Gītā 10.2] ity ādi tat tathaiva /
GE07bhg4c10u:513: he bhagavan samagraiśvaryādi-sampanna te tava vyaktiṃ prabhāvaṃ jñānātiśaya-śālino 'pi devā na vidur nāpi dānavā na maharṣaya ity api draṣṭavyam
GE07bhg4c10u:515: nātra mama ko 'py aviśvāsa ity āha sarvam iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:516: kiṃ ca te ṛṣayaḥ paraṃ brahma-dhāmānaṃ tvām ajam āhur eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:517: na tu te vyaktiṃ janma viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:518: para-brahma-svarūpasya tavājatvaṃ janmavattvaṃ ca kiṃ prakāram iti tu na vidur ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:519: ataeva na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ [Gītā 10.2] iti yat tvayoktaṃ taṃ sarvam ṛtaṃ satyam eva manye /
GE07bhg4c10u:521: ko brahmā īśo rudraś ca tāv api vayase svatattvājñānena badhnāsi,
GE07bhg4c10u:522: kiṃ punaḥ deva-dānavādyās tvāṃ na vidantīti vācyam iti bhāvaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c10u:524: etat sarvam aham ṛtaṃ satyam eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:527: keśau vidhi-rudrau vayase sva-tattvāparijñānena nibadhnāsi prajāpatiṃ ca rudraṃ ca ity ādi tvad-uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:531: te vyaktiṃ para-brahmatvādi-guṇāṃ śrī-mūrtiṃ deva-dānavāś ca na vidur yat te 'nya-svajātīyatva-buddhyā tvām avajānanti druhyanti ceti bhāvaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:536: svayam eva tvam ātmānaṃ vettha jānāsi nānyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:546: yatas tvaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṣām ādir aśakya-jñānaś cātaḥ svayam iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:547: svayam evānyonyapadeśādikam antareṇaiva tvam evātmānā svarūpeṇātmānaṃ nirupādhikaṃ sopādhikaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:548: nirupādhikaṃ pratyaktvenāviṣayatayā sopādhikaṃ ca niratiśaya-jñānaiśvaryādi-śaktimattvena vettha jānāsi nānyaḥ kaścit /
GE07bhg4c10u:549: anyair jñātum aśakyam ahaṃ kathaṃ jānīyām ity āśaṅkām apanudan premautkaṇṭhyena bahudhā sambodhayati he puruṣottama tvad-apekṣayā sarve 'pi puruṣā apakṛṣṭā eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:550: atas teṣām aśakyaṃ sarvottamasya tava śakyam evety abhiprāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:551: puruṣottamatvam eva vivṛṇoti punaś caturbhiḥ sambodhanaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:552: bhūtāni sarvāṇi bhāvayaty utpādayatīti he bhūta-bhāvana sarva-bhūta-pitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:553: pitāpi kaścin neṣṭas tatrāha he bhūteśa sarva-bhūta-niyantaḥ / niyantāpi
GE07bhg4c10u:554: kaścin nārādhyas tatrāha he deva-deva devānāṃ sarvārādhyānām apy ārādhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:555: ārādhyo 'pi kaścin na pālayitṛtvena patis tatrāha he jagat-pate hitāhitopadeśaka-veda-praṇatṛtvena sarvasya jagataḥ pālayitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:556: etādṛśa-sarva-viśeṣaṇa-viśiṣṭas tvaṃ sarveṣāṃ pitā sarveṣāṃ guruḥ sarveṣāṃ rājātaḥ sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ sarveṣām ārādhya iti kiṃ vācyaṃ puruṣottamas tvaṃ taveti bhāvaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c10u:558: tasmāt tvaṃ svayam evātmānaṃ vettha iti eva-kāreṇa tavārjatva-janmavattvādīnāṃ durghaṭānām
GE07bhg4c10u:559: api vāstavatvam eva tvad-bhakto vetti tac ca kena prakāreṇeti tu so 'pi na vettīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:560: tad apy ātmanā svenaiva vettha na sādhanāntareṇa /
GE07bhg4c10u:561: ataeva tvaṃ puruṣeṣu mahat-sraṣṭādiṣv api madhya uttamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:564: bhūtā bhūta-bhāvana-rūpā ye tad-ādayaḥ parameṣṭhy-antās teṣām īśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:566: yato devais tair eva devaḥ krīḍā yasyeti tvat-krīḍopakāra-bhūtā eva te ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:567: tad apy apārakāruṇya-vaśād jagad-vartinā man mādṛśānām api tvam eva patir bhavasi iti catūrṇāṃ sambodhana-padānām arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:568: yad vā puruṣottamatvam eva vivṛṇoti he bhūta-bhāvana sarva-bhūta-pitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:571: / bhūteśo 'pi kaścin nārādhyas tatrāha he devadeva /
GE07bhg4c10u:572: devārādhyo 'pi kaścin na pālayatīti tatrāha he jagat-pate //15//
GE07bhg4c10u:573: baladevaḥ : svayam eva tvam ātmānā svenaiva jñānenātmānaṃ saṃvettha idam ittham iti jānāsi /
GE07bhg4c10u:574: ye deveṣu dānaveṣu ca tvad-bhaktās te tādṛśīṃ tvan-mūrtiṃ vastu-bhūtāṃ jānanty eva tasyās tathātve kathaṃ tāṃ na jānantīty eva-kārāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:576: puruṣottamas tvaṃ vivṛṇvan sambodhayati he bhūta-bhāvana /
GE07bhg4c10u:581: bhūteśo 'pi kaścin na pūjyas tatrāha he devadeva /
GE07bhg4c10u:583: devadevo 'pi kaścin na rakṣakas tatrāha he jagat-pate /
GE07bhg4c10u:587: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07bhg4c10u:588: yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi //16//
GE07bhg4c10u:589: śrīdharaḥ : yasmāt tavābhivyaktiṃ tvam eva vetsi na devādayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:591: yā ātmanas tava divyā atyadbhutā vibhūtayas tā sarvā vaktuṃ tvam evārhasi yogyo 'si /
GE07bhg4c10u:594: yasmād anyeṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ jñātum aśakyā avaśyaṃ jñātavyāś ca tava vibhūtayas tasmāt vaktum iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:595: yābhir vibhūtibhir imān sarvān lokān vyāpya tvaṃ tiṣṭhasi tās tavāsādhāraṇā vibhūtayo
GE07bhg4c10u:596: divyā asarvajñair jñātum aśakyā hi yasmāt tasmāt sarvajñas tvam eva tā aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi //16 //
GE07bhg4c10u:598: tava tattvaṃ durgamaṃ tava vibhūtiṣv eva mama jijñāsā jāyata iti dyotayann āha vaktum iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:599: divyā utkṛṣṭā yā ātma-vibhūtayas tāvad vaktum arhasīty anvayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:600: nanv aśeṣeṇa mad-vibhūtayaḥ sarvā vaktum aśakyā eva tatrāha yābhir iti //16//
GE07bhg4c10u:601: baladevaḥ : tvat-svarūpa-yāthātmyaṃ khalu kathaṃ tathā durgamevātas tvad-vibhūtiṣv eva maj-jijñāsopajāyata iti sūcayann āha vaktum iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:602: divyā utkṛṣṭās tad-asādhāraṇīyātmano vibhūtīr aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi dvitīyārthe prathamā /
GE07bhg4c10u:603: yābhir viśiṣṭas tvam imān lokān vyāpya niyamya tiṣṭhasi //16//
GE07bhg4c10u:605: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan /
GE07bhg4c10u:606: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā //17//
GE07bhg4c10u:607: śrīdharaḥ : kathana-prayojanaṃ darśayan prārthayate katham iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c10u:608: he yogin kathaṃ kair vibhūti-bhedaiḥ sadā paricintayann ahaṃ tvāṃ vidyāṃ jānīyām ?
GE07bhg4c10u:609: vibhūti-bhedena cintyo 'pi tvaṃ keṣu keṣu padārtheṣu mayā cintanīyo 'si ? //17//
GE07bhg4c10u:611: kiṃ prayojanaṃ tat-kathanasya tad āha katham iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c10u:612: yogo niratiśayaiśvaryādi-śaktiḥ so 'syāstīti he yogin niratiśaiśvaryādi-śakti-śālinn
GE07bhg4c10u:613: aham atisthūlamatis tvāṃ devādibhir api jñātum aśakyaṃ kathaṃ vidyāṃ jānīyāṃ sadā
GE07bhg4c10u:615: nanu mad-vibhūtiṣu māṃ dhyāyan jñāsyasi tatrāha keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cetanācetanātmakeṣu vastuṣu tvad-vibhūti-bhūteṣu mayā cintyo 'si he bhagavan
GE07bhg4c10u:617: yogo yoga-māyā-śaktir vartate yasya he yogin vanamālītivat /
GE07bhg4c10u:618: tvām ahaṃ kathaṃ paricintayan san tvāṃ sadā vidyāṃ jānīyām ?
GE07bhg4c10u:619: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ [BhP 11.14.11] iti tvad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:620: tathā keṣu bhāveṣu padārtheṣu tvaṃ cintyaḥ tvac-cintana-bhaktir mayā kartavyety arthaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c10u:621: baladevaḥ : nanu kimarthaṃ tat-kathanṃ tatrāha katham iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:622: yogo yoga-māyā-śaktir asty asyeti he yogin /
GE07bhg4c10u:623: tvāṃ sadā paricintayan saṃsmarann ahaṃ kalyāṇānanta-guṇa-yoginaṃ kathaṃ vidyāṃ jānīyām ?
GE07bhg4c10u:624: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu padārtheṣu prakāśamānas tvaṃ mayā cintyo dhyeyo 'si ?
GE07bhg4c10u:626: tac ca vibhūty-uddeśenaiva setsyatīti tām upadiśety arthaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c10u:629: bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam //18//
GE07bhg4c10u:630: śrīdharaḥ : tad evaṃ bahirmukho 'pi citte tatra tatra vibhūti-bhedena tvac-cintaiva yathā bhavet tathā vistareṇa kathayaty āha vistareṇeti /
GE07bhg4c10u:631: ātmanas tava yogaṃ sarvajñatva-sarva-śaktitvādi-lakṣaṇaṃ yogaiśvaryaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca vistareṇa punaḥ kathaya /
GE07bhg4c10u:632: hi yatas tava vākyam amṛta-rūpaṃ śṛṇvato mama tṛptir alaṃ buddhir nāsti //18//
GE07bhg4c10u:635: ātmanas tava yogaṃ sarvajñatva-sarva-śaktitvādi-lakṣaṇam aiśvaryātiśayaṃ vibhūtiṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:636: ca dhyānālambanaṃ vistareṇa saṃkṣepeṇa saptame navame coktam api bhūyaḥ kathaya sarvair
GE07bhg4c10u:640: uktasya punaḥ kathanaṃ kuto yācase tatrāha tṛptir alaṃ-pratyayenecchā-vicchittir nāsti hi yasmāc chṛṇvataḥ śravaṇena pibatas tvad-vākyam amṛtam amṛtavat pade pade svādu svādu /
GE07bhg4c10u:641: atra tvad-vākyam ity anukter apahnuty-atiśayokti-rūpaka-saṅkaro 'yaṃ mādhuryātiśayānubhavenotkaṇṭhātiśayaṃ vyanakti //18//
GE07bhg4c10u:643: nana ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate [Gītā 10.8] ity anenaiva sarve
GE07bhg4c10u:644: padārthā mad-vibhūtayo mad-uktā eva vibhūtayas tathā iti matvā bhajante mām iti bhakti-yogaś cokta eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:646: he janārdaneti mādṛśa-janānāṃ tvam eva hitopadeśa-mādhuryeṇa lobham utpādyārdayase yācayasīti vayaṃ kiṃ kurma iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:648: baladevaḥ : nanu pūrva-pūrvatra ajo 'pi sann [Gītā 4.6] ity ādinājatvādi-kalyāṇa-guṇa-yogo raso 'ham [Gītā 7.8] ity ādinā vibhūtayaś cāsakṛt
GE07bhg4c10u:649: kiṃ punaḥ pṛcchasīti cet tatrāha vistareṇeti /
GE07bhg4c10u:652: tvad-vākyam amṛtaṃ śṛṇvataḥ śrotra-rasanayāsvādayato mama tṛptir nāsti /
GE07bhg4c10u:657: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātma-vibhūtayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:658: prādhānyataḥ kuru-śreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me //19//
GE07bhg4c10u:659: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ prārthitaḥ san bhagavān uvāca hanteti /
GE07bhg4c10u:661: divyā yā mad-vibhūtayas tāḥ prādhānyena te tubhyaṃ kathayiṣyāmi yato 'vāntarasya vibhūti-vistarasya madīyasyānto nāsti /
GE07bhg4c10u:666: yat tvayā prārthitaṃ tat kariṣyāmi mā vyākulo bhūr ity arjunaṃ samāśvāsya tad eva kartum ārabhate /
GE07bhg4c10u:667: kathayiṣyāmi prādhānyatas tā vibhūtīr yā divyā hi prasiddhā ātmano mamāsādhāraṇā vibhūtayo he kuru-śreṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c10u:669: yato nāsty antyo vistarasya me vibhūtīnām /
GE07bhg4c10u:670: ataḥ pradhāna-bhūtāḥ kāścid eva vibhūtīr vakṣyāmīty arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c10u:672: hantety anukampāyāṃ prādhānyataḥ prādhānyena yatas tāsāṃ vistarasyānto nāsti /
GE07bhg4c10u:673: vibhūtayo vibhūtīr divyā uttamā eva na tu tṛṇeṣṭakādyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:674: atra vibhūti-śabdena prākṛtāprākṛta-vastūny evocyate tāni sarvāṇy eva bhagavac-chakti-samudbhūtatvād bhagavad-rūpeṇaiva tāratamyena dhyeyatvenābhimatāni jñeyāni //19//
GE07bhg4c10u:675: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śrī-bhagavān uvāca hanteti /
GE07bhg4c10u:680: prādhānyataḥ prādhānyena yatas tāsāṃ vistarasyānto nāsti /
GE07bhg4c10u:681: iha vibhūti-śabdena niyāmakatva-rūpāṇy aiśvaryāṇi bodhyāni vibhūtir bhūtir aiśvaryam ity amara-koṣāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:683: tāni sarvāṇi sarveśa-śakti-vyaṅgatvāt sarveśātmnaā tāratamyena bhāvyāni /
GE07bhg4c10u:685: tāni tu tena rūpeṇa bhāvanārthāny eva,
GE07bhg4c10u:686: na tv anyavat tac-chakty-ekadeśa-rūpāṇīti bodhyaṃ saṅgater iti //19//
GE07bhg4c10u:689: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca //20//
GE07bhg4c10u:690: śrīdharaḥ : tatra prathamam aiśvaraṃ rūpaṃ kathayati he guḍākeśa /
GE07bhg4c10u:691: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āśayeṣv antaḥkaraṇeṣu sarvajñatvādi-guṇair niyantṛtvenāvasthitaḥ paramātmāham /
GE07bhg4c10u:695: sarva-bhūtānāṃ janmādi-hetuś ca aham evety arthaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c10u:697: tatra prathamaṃ tāvan mukhyaṃ cintanīyaṃ śṛṇu aham iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:698: sarva-bhūtānām āśaye hṛd-deśe 'ntaryāmi-rūpeṇa pratyag-ātma-rūpeṇa ca sthita ātmā caitanyānanda-ghanas tvayāhaṃ vāsudeva eveti dhyeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:701: evaṃ dhyānāsāmarthye tu vakṣyamāṇāni dhyānāni kāryāṇi /
GE07bhg4c10u:702: tatrāpy ādau dhyeyam āha - aham evādiś cotpattir bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ cetanatvena loke
GE07bhg4c10u:703: vyavahriyamāṇānāṃ madhyaṃ ca sthitir antaś ca nāśaḥ sarva-cetana-vargāṇām utpatti-sthita-nāśa-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c10u:704: tat-kāraṇa-rūpeṇa cāham eva dhyeya ity arthaḥ //20 //
GE07bhg4c10u:706: atra prathamaṃ mām evaikāṃśena sarva-vibhūti-kāraṇaṃ tvaṃ bhāvayety āha aham iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:708: he guḍākeśa jita-nidra iti dhyāna-sāmarthyaṃ sūcayati /
GE07bhg4c10u:709: sarva-bhūto yo vairājas tasyāśaye sthita iti samaṣṭi-virāḍ antaryāmī /
GE07bhg4c10u:710: tathā sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām āśaye sthita iti vyaṣṭi-virāḍ antaryāmī ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:711: bhūtānāṃ ādir janma madhyaṃ sthitir antaḥ saṃhāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:713: baladevaḥ : tatra tāvan mām eva tvaṃ mahat-sraṣṭādi-tri-rūpeṇa svāṃśena nikhila-vibhūti-hetuṃ vicintayety āśayenāha aham ātmeti /
GE07bhg4c10u:715: ātmā vibhūti-vijñānānando mahat-sraṣṭādi-tri-rūpaḥ paramātmāham asmac-chabdārthaḥ sarva-bhūtāśaya-sthitas tvayā vicintyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:716: sarva-bhūtā pradhānādi-pṛthivy-anta-tattva-rūpā yā mūla-prakṛtis tasyā āśaye 'ntaḥ-karaṇodaśaya-rūpeṇāham eva prakṛty-antaryāmī sthitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:717: tathā sarva-bhūtaḥ sarva-jīvābhimānī yo vairājas tasyāśaye garbhodaśaya-rūpeṇāham eva samaṣṭi-virāḍ-antaryāmī sthitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:718: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām jīvānām āśaye kṣīroda-śaya-rūpeṇāham eva vyaṣṭi-virāḍ antaryāmī sthita iti tāni trīṇi rūpāṇi mad-vibhūtitvena tvayā vincintyānīty
GE07bhg4c10u:719: / subālopaniṣadi prakṛty-ādi-sarva-bhūtāntaryāmī sarva-śeṣī ca nārāyaṇaḥ paṭhyate /
GE07bhg4c10u:721: viṣṇos tu trīṇi rūpāṇi puruṣākhyāny atho viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:722: ekaṃ tu mahataḥ sraṣṭṛ dvitīyaṃ tantu-saṃsthitam /
GE07bhg4c10u:723: tṛtīyaṃ sarva-bhūtasthaṃ tāni jñātvā vimucyate // iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:727: bhūtānām ādir utpattir madhyaṃ pālanam antaś ca saṃhāras tat-tad-dhetur aham evokta-puruṣa-lakṣyas tvayā bhāvyaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c10u:729: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān /
GE07bhg4c10u:730: marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī //21//
GE07bhg4c10u:731: śrīdharaḥ : idānīṃ vibhūtīḥ kathayati ādityānām ity ādinā yāvad-adhyāya-samāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:733: jyotiṣāṃ prakāśakānāṃ madhye 'ṃśumān viśva-vyāpi-raśmi-yukto raviḥ sūryo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:737: te ca avahaḥ pravaho vivahaḥ parāvaha udvahaḥ saṃvaha parivaha iti spata marud-gaṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:740: etad-aśaktena bāhyāni dhyānāni kāryāṇīty āha yāvad-adhyāya-samāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:741: ādityānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ madhye viṣṇur visṇu-nāmādityo 'ham vāmanāvatāro vā /
GE07bhg4c10u:742: jyotiṣāṃ prakāśakānāṃ madhye 'haṃ ravir ṃśumān viśva-vyāpī prakāśakaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:743: marutāṃ sapta-saptakānāṃ madhye marīci-nāmāham nakṣatrāṇām adhipatir ahaṃ śaśī candramāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:746: kvacit sambandhe 'pi yathā bhūtānām asmi cetanety ādau /
GE07bhg4c10u:747: vāmana-rāmādayaś cāvatārāḥ sarvaiśvarya-śālino 'py anena rūpeṇa dhyāna-vivakṣayā vibhūtiṣu paṭhyante /
GE07bhg4c10u:748: vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevo 'smīti tena rūpeṇa dhyāna-vivakṣayā savasyāpi sva-vibhūti-madhye pāṭhavat /
GE07bhg4c10u:749: ataḥ paraṃ ca prāyeṇāyam adhyāyaḥ spaṣṭārtha
GE07bhg4c10u:752: atha nirdhāraṇa-ṣaṣṭhyā kvacit sambandha-ṣaṣṭhyā ca vibhutīr āha yāvad-adhyāya-samāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:753: ādityānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ madhye viṣṇur aham iti tan-nāmā sūryo mad-vibhūtir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:754: evaṃ sarvatra prakāśakānāṃ jyotiṣāṃ madhye aṃśumān mahā-kiraṇa-mālī ravir aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:756: baladevaḥ : ādityānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ madhye viṣṇur vāmano 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:757: jyotiṣāṃ prakāśānāṃ madhye 'ṃśumān viśva-vyāpi-raśmī ravir aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:760: atra nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī prāyeṇa kvacit sambandhe 'pīti bodhyam //21//
GE07bhg4c10u:763: indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā //22//
GE07bhg4c10u:768: catūrṇāṃ vedānāṃ madhye gāna-mādhuryeṇātiramaṇīyaḥ sāmavedo 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:771: bhūtānāṃ sarva-prāṇi-sambandhināṃ pariṇāmānāṃ madhye cid-abhivyañjikā buddher vṛttiś cetanāham asmi //22//
GE07bhg4c10u:776: devānāṃ madhye vāsavas teṣāṃ rājā indro 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:777: indriyāṇāṃ madhye durjayaṃ teṣāṃ pravartakaṃ ca mano 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:781: vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham //23//
GE07bhg4c10u:783: rakṣasām api krūratvādi-sāmyād yakṣaiḥ sahaikīkṛtya nirdeśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:789: vitteśo dhanādhyakṣaḥ kubero yakṣa-rakṣasāṃ yakṣānāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:791: meruḥ sumeruḥ śikhariṇām śikharavatām atyucchritānāṃ parvatānām //23//
GE07bhg4c10u:794: baladevaḥ : rudrāṇām ekādaśānāṃ madhye śaṅkarākhyo rudro 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:799: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim /
GE07bhg4c10u:800: senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ //24//
GE07bhg4c10u:802: purodhasāṃ madhye deva-purohitatvān mukhyaṃ bṛhaspatim māṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c10u:806: indrasya sarva-rāja-śreṣṭhatvāt tat-purodhasaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ sarveṣāṃ purodhasāṃ rāja-purohitānāṃ madhye mukhyaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mām eva he pārtha viddhi jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c10u:807: senānīnām senāpatīnāṃ madhye deva-senāpatiḥ skando guho 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:808: sarasām deva-khāta-jalāśayānāṃ madhye sāgaraḥ sagara-putraiḥ khāto jalāśayo 'ham asmi //24//
GE07bhg4c10u:812: baladevaḥ : indrasya sarva-rāja-mukhyatvāt tat-purohitaṃ bṛhaspatiṃ sarva-patiṃ rāja-purohitānāṃ mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhīti so 'ham ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:817: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram /
GE07bhg4c10u:820: girāṃ vācāṃ padātmikānāṃ madhye ekam akṣaram oṅkārākhyaṃ padam asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:823: maharṣīṇāṃ sapta-brahmaṇāṃ madhye bhṛgur atitejasvitvād aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:824: girāṃ vācāṃ pada-lakṣaṇānāṃ madhya ekam akṣaram padam oṃkāro 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:827: śikharavatāṃ madhye hi merur aham ity uktam ataḥ sthāvaratvena śikharatvena cārtha-bhedāv adoṣaḥ //25//
GE07bhg4c10u:830: baladevaḥ : maharṣīṇāṃ brahma-putrāṇāṃ madhye 'titejasvī bhṛgur aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:831: girāṃ pada-lakṣaṇānāṃ vācāṃ madhye ekam akṣaram praṇavo 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:838: devā eva santo ye mantra-darśanena ṛṣitvaṃ prāptās teṣāṃ madhye nārado 'smi /
GE07bhg4c10u:839: siddhānām utpattitaḥ eva adhigata-paramārtha-tattvānāṃ madhye kapilākhyo munir asmi //26//
GE07bhg4c10u:842: devā eva santo ye mantra-darśitvena ṛṣitvaṃ prāptās te devarṣayas teṣāṃ madhye nārado 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:843: gandharvāṇāṃ gāna-dharmaṇāṃ deva-gāyakānāṃ madhye citraratho 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:844: siddhānāṃ janmanaiva vinā prayatnaṃ dharma-jñāna-vairāgyaiśvaryātiśayaṃ prāptānām adhigata-paramārthānāṃ madhye kapilo munir aham //26//
GE07bhg4c10u:846: baladevaḥ : pūjyatvena sarva-vṛkṣāṇāṃ madhye śreṣṭho 'śvattho 'haṃ devarṣīṇāṃ madhye parama-bhaktatvenotkṛṣṭo nārado 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:848: siddhānāṃ svābhāvikāṇimādimatāṃ kapilaḥ kārdamir munir aham //26//
GE07bhg4c10u:853: amṛtārthaṃ kṣīrodadhi-manthanād udbhūtam uccaiḥśravasam nāmāśvaṃ mad-vibhūtiṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c10u:857: aśvānāṃ madhya uccaiḥśravasam amṛta-mathanodbhavam aśvaṃ māṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c10u:858: airāvataṃ gajam amṛta-mathanodbhavam gajendrāṇāṃ madhye māṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c10u:859: narāṇāṃ ca madhye narādhipaṃ rājānaṃ māṃ viddhīty anuṣajyate //27//
GE07bhg4c10u:863: gajendrāṇāṃ madhye airāvataṃ ca māṃ viddhi /
GE07bhg4c10u:864: amṛtodbhavam amṛtārthakāt kṣīrābdhi-mathanāj jātam iti dvayor viśeṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c10u:867: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk /
GE07bhg4c10u:868: prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ //28//
GE07bhg4c10u:873: na kevalaṃ sambhoga-mātra-pradhānaḥ kāmo mad-vibhūtir aśāstrīyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:876: āyudhānāṃ astrāṇāṃ madhye vajraṃ dadhīcer asth-sambhavam astram aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:877: dhenūnāṃ dogdhrīṇāṃ madhye kāmaṃ dogdhīti kāma-dhuk /
GE07bhg4c10u:879: kāmānāṃ madhye prajanaḥ prajanayitā putrotpatty-artho yaḥ kandarpaḥ kāmaḥ so 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:881: sarpāś ca nāgāś ca jāti-bhedād bhidyante /
GE07bhg4c10u:882: tatra sarpāṇām madhye teṣāṃ rājā vāsukir aham asmi //28//
GE07bhg4c10u:886: baladevaḥ : āyudhānāṃ madhye vajraṃ pavir aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:892: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:893: pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham //29//
GE07bhg4c10u:900: nāgānāṃ jāti-bhedānāṃ madhye teṣāṃ rājānantaś ca śeṣākhyo 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:901: yādasām jala-carāṇāṃ madhye teṣāṃ rājā varuṇo 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:902: pitṝṇām madhye 'ryamā nāma pitṛ-rājaś cāham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:903: saṃyamatām saṃyamaṃ dharmādharma-phala-dānenānugrahaṃ nigrahaṃ ca kurvatāṃ madhye yamo 'ham smi //29//
GE07bhg4c10u:910: saṃyamatām daṇḍayatāṃ madhye nyāya-daṇḍa-kṛt yamo 'haṃ chādeśābhāva ārṣaḥ //29//
GE07bhg4c10u:912: prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:913: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām //30//
GE07bhg4c10u:915: kalayatāṃ vaśīkurvatāṃ gaṇayatāṃ vā madhye kālo 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:919: daityānāṃ diti-vaṃśyānāṃ madhye prakarṣeṇa hlādayaty ānandayati parama-sāttvikatvena sarvān iti prahlādaś cāsmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:920: kalayatāṃ saṅkhyānaṃ gaṇanaṃ kurvatāṃ madhye kālo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:927: baladevaḥ : daityānāṃ diti-vaṃśyānāṃ madhye teṣām adhipatir bhagavan-niṣṭhātiśayād varīyān prahlādo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:932: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:933: jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī //31//
GE07bhg4c10u:935: pavatāṃ pāvayitṝṇāṃ vegavatāṃ vā madhye vāyur aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:938: jhaṣāṇāṃ matsyānāṃ madhye makaro nāma matsya-jāti-viśeṣo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:941: pavatāṃ pāvayitṝṇāṃ vegavatāṃ vā madhye pavano vāyur aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:942: śastrabhṛtām śastra-dhāriṇāṃ yuddha-kuśalānāṃ madhye rāmo dāśarathir akhila-rākṣasa-kula-kṣaya-karaḥ parama-vīro 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:943: sākṣāt-svarūpasyāpy anena rūpeṇa cintanārthaṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevo 'smītivad atra pāṭha iti prāg uktam /
GE07bhg4c10u:944: jhaṣāṇāṃ matsyānāṃ madhye makaro nāma taj-jāti-viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:945: srotasām vegena calaj-jalānāṃ nadīnāṃ madhye sarva-nadī-śreṣṭhā jāhnavī gaṅgāham asmi //31//
GE07bhg4c10u:947: pavatāṃ vegavatāṃ pavitrīkurvatāṃ vā madhye rāmaḥ paraśurāmas tasyāveśāvatāratvād āveśānāṃ ca jīva-viśeṣatvād yuktam eva vibhūtitvam /
GE07bhg4c10u:949: etat te kathitaṃ devi jāmadagner mahātmanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:954: ta āveśā nigadyante jīvā eva mahattamāḥ // [LBhāg 1.1.18] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:957: baladevaḥ : pavatāṃ pāvanānāṃ vegavatāṃ ca madhye pavano vāyur aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:962: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna /
GE07bhg4c10u:967: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ cety atra sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtvaṃ pāramaiśvaryam uktam /
GE07bhg4c10u:968: atra tūtpatti-sthiti-pralayā mad-vibhūtitvena dhyeyā ity ucyate iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:970: pravadatāṃ vādināṃ sambandhinyo vāda-jalpa-vitaṇḍākhyās tisraḥ kathāḥ prasiddhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:972: yatra dvābhyām api pramāṇatas tarkataś ca svapakṣaḥ sthāpyate para-pakṣaś ca cchala-jāti-nigraha-sthānais tat-pakṣaṃ dūṣayati na tu sva-pakṣaṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:975: vādas tu vīta-rāgayoḥ śiṣyācāryayor anyayor vā tattva-nirūpaṇa-phalaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:979: sargāṇām acetana-sṛṣṭīnām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ cotpatti-sthiti-layā aham eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:981: bhūtānāṃ jīvāviṣṭānāṃ cetanatvena prasiddhānām evādir antaś ca madhyaṃ cety uktam upakrame,
GE07bhg4c10u:982: iha tv acetana-sargāṇām iti na paunaruktyam /
GE07bhg4c10u:984: pravadatāṃ pravadat-sambandhināṃ kathā-bhedānāṃ vāda-jalpa-vitaṇḍātmakānāṃ madhye vādo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:985: bhūtānām asmi cetanety atra yathā bhūta-śabdena tat-sambandhinaḥ pariṇāmā lakṣitās tatheha pravadac-chabdena tat-sambandhinaḥ kathā-bhedā lakṣyante
GE07bhg4c10u:988: tatra tattva-bubhutsvor vītarāgayoḥ sa-brahmacāriṇor guru-śiṣyayor vā pramāṇena tarkeṇa ca sādhana-dūṣaṇātmā sa-pakṣa-pratipakṣa-parigrahas
GE07bhg4c10u:990: tad uktaṃ pramāṇa-tarka-sādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣa-pratipakṣa-parigraho vādaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:991: vāda-phalasaya tattva-nirṇayasya durdurūḍha-vādi-nirākaraṇena saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ vijigīṣu-kathe jalpa-vitaṇḍe jaya-parāyaja-mātra-paryante /
GE07bhg4c10u:992: tad uktam tattvādhyavasāya-saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ jalpa-vitaṇḍe bīja-praroha-saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ kaṇṭaka-śākhā-prāvaraṇavat [NyāyaD 4.2.47] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:993: chala-jāti-nigraha-sthānaiḥ para-pakṣo dūṣyata iti jalpe vitaṇḍāyāṃ ca samānam /
GE07bhg4c10u:994: tatra vitaṇḍāyām ekena sva-pakṣaḥ sthāpyata eva,
GE07bhg4c10u:996: jalpe tūbhābhyām api sva-pakṣaḥ sthāpyata ubhābhyām api para-pakṣo dūṣyata iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:999: ato vitaṇḍā-dvaya-śarīratvāj jalpo nāma naikā kathā,
GE07bhg4c10u:1000: kintu śakty-atiśaya-jñānārthaṃ samaya-bandha-mātreṇa pravartata iti khaṇḍana-kārāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1001: tattvādhyvasāya-paryavasāyitvena tu vādasya śreṣṭhatvam uktam eva //32//
GE07bhg4c10u:1003: sṛjyanta iti sargā ākāśādayas teṣām ādiḥ sṛṣṭir antaḥ saṃhāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1004: madhyaṃ pālanaṃ ceti sṛṣṭi-sthiti-pralayā mad-vibhūtitvena dhyeyā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1005: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ cety atra sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartā parameśvara evoktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1006: vidyānāṃ jñānānāṃ madhye aham ātma-vidyā ātma-jñānam /
GE07bhg4c10u:1007: pravadatāṃ sva-pakṣaṃ sthāpana-para-pakṣa-dūṣaṇādi-rūpa-jalpa-vitaṇḍādi-kurvatāṃ vādas tattva-nirṇayaḥ pravṛtti-siddhānte yaḥ so 'ham //32//
GE07bhg4c10u:1008: baladevaḥ : sargāṇāṃ mahad-ādīnāṃ jaḍa-sṛṣṭīnām ādir anto madhyaṃ cāham iti teṣāṃ sarga-saṃhāra-pālanāni mad-vibhūtitayā bhāvyānīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1009: aham ādiś ca ity ādau mat-svāṃśa-cetanānāṃ bhūtānāṃ sargādi-hetur mad-vibhūtir ity uktamato na punaḥ punar-uktiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1011: dharma-śāstraṃ purāṇaṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa //
GE07bhg4c10u:1012: ity uktānāṃ vidyānāṃ madhye 'dhyātma-vidyā saparikara-paramātma-nirṇetrī caturlakṣaṇī vedānta-vidyāham evety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1014: teṣāṃ khalu vāda-jalpa-vitaṇḍās tisraḥ kathāḥ prasiddhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1016: yatrobhābhyāṃ pramāṇena tarkenṇa sva-pakṣaḥ sthāpyate chala-jāti-nigraha-sthānaiḥ para-pakṣo dūṣyate sva-pakṣa-sthāpana-hanā para-pakṣa-dūṣaṇāvasānā kathā vitaṇḍā /
GE07bhg4c10u:1017: ete pravadator vijigīṣvoḥ śakti-mātra-parīkṣake niṣphale tattva-bubhutsu-kathā vādaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1025: tathā ca śrutiḥ akāro vai sarvā vāk saiṣā sparśoṣambhir vyajyamānā bahvī nānā-rūpā bhavati [Ai.Ā. 1.3.6] iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:1026: sāmāsikasya samāsa-samūhasya madhye dvandvaḥ rāma-kṛṣṇāv ity-ādi-sāmāso 'smi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1029: kālaḥ kalayatām aham ity atrāyur gaṇanātmakaḥ saṃvatsara-śatādy-āyuḥ svarūpaḥ kāla uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1030: sa ca tasminn āyuṣi kṣīṇe sati kṣīyate /
GE07bhg4c10u:1031: atra tu pravāhātmako 'kṣayaḥ kāla ucyate iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1036: a-kāro vai sarvā vāk [Ai.Ā. 1.3.6] iti śrutes tasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ prasiddham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1037: dvandvaḥ samāsa ubhaya-padārtha-pradhānaḥ sāmāsikasya samāsa-samūhasya madhye 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1038: pūrva-padārtha-pradhāno 'vyayībhāva uttara-padārtha-pradhānas tatpuruṣo 'nyapadārtha-pradhāno bahuvrīhir iti teṣām ubhaya-padārtha-sāmyābhāvenāpakṛṣṭatvāt
GE07bhg4c10u:1039: kṣayi-kālābhimāny akṣayaḥ kālaḥ jñaḥ kāla-kālo guṇī sarva-vidyaḥ ity ādi-śruti-prasiddho 'ham eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:1040: kālaḥ kalayatām aham ity atra tu kṣayī kāla ukta iti bhedaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1041: karma-phala-vidhātṝṇāṃ madhye viśvatomukhaḥ sarvato mukho dhātā sarva-karma-phala-dāteśvaro 'ham ity arthaḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c10u:1043: sāmāsikasya samāsa-samūhasya madhye dvandvaḥ ubhaya-padārtha-pradhānatvena tasya samāseṣu śraiṣṭhyāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:1044: akṣayaḥ kālaḥ saṃhartṝṇāṃ madhye mahākālo rudro viśvatomukhaś caturbhyo 'haṃ dhātā sraṣṭṝṇāṃ madhye brahmā //33//
GE07bhg4c10u:1046: a-kāro vai sarvā vāk [Ai.Ā. 1.3.6] iti śrutiś ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:1051: sraṣṭṝṇāṃ madhye viśvatomukhaś catur-vaktro dhātā vidhir aham //33//
GE07bhg4c10u:1053: mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām /
GE07bhg4c10u:1054: kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā //34//
GE07bhg4c10u:1059: yāsām ābhāsa-mātra-yogena prāṇinaḥ ślāghyā bhavanti tāḥ kīrty-ādyāḥ striyo mad-vibhūtayaḥ //34//
GE07bhg4c10u:1061: saṃhāra-kāriṇāṃ madhye sarva-haraḥ sarva-saṃhāra-kārī mṛtyur aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1062: bhaviṣyatāṃ bhāvi-kalyāṇānāṃ ya udbhava utkarṣaḥ sa cāham eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:1063: nārīṇāṃ madhye kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣameti ca sapta dharma-patnyo 'ham eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:1064: tatra kīrtir dhārmikatva-nimittā praśastatvena nānā-dig-deśīya-loka-jñāna-viṣayatā-rūpā khyātiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1065: śrīr dharmārtha-kāma-sampat śarīra-śobhā vā kāntir vā /
GE07bhg4c10u:1066: vāk sarasvatī sarvasyārthasya prakāśikā saṃskṛtā vāṇī /
GE07bhg4c10u:1074: yāsām ābhāsa-mātra-sambandhenāpi janaḥ sarva-lokādaraṇīyo bhavati tāsāṃ sarva-strīṣūttamatvam atiprasiddham eva //34//
GE07bhg4c10u:1076: prātikṣaṇikānāṃ mṛtyūnāṃ madhye sarvaharaḥ sarva-smṛti-haro mṛtyur ahaṃ yad uktaṃ mṛtyur atyanta-vismṛtiḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c10u:1077: bhaviṣyatāṃ bhāvināṃ prāṇi-vikārāṇāṃ madhye udbhavaḥ prathama-vikāro jagmāham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1079: śrīḥ kāntiḥ vāk saṃsmṛtā vāṇīti tisras tathā smṛty-ādayaś catasraḥ ca-kārāt mūrtyādayaś cānyā dharma-patnyaś cāham //34//
GE07bhg4c10u:1080: baladevaḥ : prātikṣaṇikānāṃ mṛtyūnāṃ madhye sarva-smṛti-haro mṛtyur aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1081: bhaviṣyatāṃ bhāvināṃ prāṇi-vikārāṇām udbhavo janmākhyaḥ prathama-vikāro 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1091: kṣamā harṣe viṣāde ca prāpte nirvikāra-cittatā //34//
GE07bhg4c10u:1093: bṛhat-sāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1096: tvām iddhi havāmahe [Rv 6.46.1] ity asyām ṛci gīyamānaṃ bṛhat-sāma /
GE07bhg4c10u:1097: tena cendraṃ sarveśvaratvena sthūyata iti śraiṣṭhyam /
GE07bhg4c10u:1102: vedānāṃ sāmavedo 'smīty uktaṃ tatrāyam anyo viśeṣaḥ sāmnām ṛg-akṣarārūḍhānāṃ gīti-viśeṣāṇāṃ madhye tvām iddhi havāmaha [Rv 6.46.1] ity asyām ṛci gīti-viśeṣo bṛhat-sāma /
GE07bhg4c10u:1103: tac cātirātre pṛṣṭha-stotraṃ sarveśvaratvenendra-stuti-rūpam anyataḥ śreṣṭhatvād aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1106: somo na labdho 'kṣarāṇi ca hāritāni jagatyā trīṇi triṣṭubhaikam iti catvāri tair
GE07bhg4c10u:1107: akṣaraiḥ saha somasyāharaṇena ca sarva-śreṣṭhā gāyatry-ṛg aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1108: catur-akṣarāṇi ha vā agre chandāṃsy āsutato jagatī somam acchātpat sā trīṇy akṣarāṇi hitvā jagām tatas
GE07bhg4c10u:1109: triṣṭup somam acchāpatat saikam akṣaraṃ hitvāpatat tato gāyatrī somam acchāpatat
GE07bhg4c10u:1110: sā tāni cākṣarāṇi haranty āgacchat somaṃ ca tasmād aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī ity upakramya
GE07bhg4c10u:1111: tadāhur gāyatrāṇi vai sarvāṇi savanāni gāyatrī hy evaitad upasṛjamānaiḥ iti śatapatha-śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1112: gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtam ity-ādi-chāndogya-śruteś ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:1113: māsānāṃ dvādaśānāṃ madhye 'bhinivaśāli-vāstūka-śākādi-śālī śīrtātapa-śūnyatvena ca sukha-hetur mārgaśīrṣo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1114: ṛtūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ madhye kusumākaraḥ sarva-sugandhi-kusumānām ākaro 'tiramaṇīyo vasantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1123: tatra sāmnām api madhye bṛhat-sāma tvām iddhi havāmahe [Rv 6.46.1] ity asyām ṛci vigīyamānaṃ bṛhat-sāma /
GE07bhg4c10u:1128: sāmnām ṛg-akṣara-rūḍhānāṃ gīti-viśeṣāṇāṃ madhye tvām iddhi havāmahe [Rv 6.46.1] ity
GE07bhg4c10u:1129: asyām ṛci gītiṃ viśeṣo bṛhat-sāma tac cātirātre pṛṣṭha-stotraṃ sarveśvaratvendra-stuti-rūpam
GE07bhg4c10u:1131: chandasāṃ niyatākṣara-pādatva-rūpa-cchando-viśiṣṭānām ṛcāṃ madhye gāyatrī ṛg ahaṃ dvijāter dvitīya-janma-hetutvena tasyāḥ śraiṣṭhyāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:1132: gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yad idaṃ kiṃ ca iti brahmāvatāratva-śravaṇāc ca /
GE07bhg4c10u:1134: kusumākaro vasanto 'ham iti śītātapābhāvena vividha-sugandhi-puṣpamayatvena mad-utsava-hetutvena ca tasyānyebhyaḥ śraiṣṭhyāt //35//
GE07bhg4c10u:1136: dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1145: chalayatāṃ chalasya para-vañcanasya kartṝṇāṃ sambandhi dyūtam akṣa-devanādi-lakṣaṇaṃ sarvasvāpahārakāraṇam aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1146: tejasvinām atyugra-prabhāvavatāṃ sambandhi tejo 'pratihatājñatvam aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1149: sattvavatāṃ sāttvikānāṃ dharma-jñāna-vairāgyaiśvarya-lakṣaṇaṃ sattva-kāryam evātra sattvam aham //36//
GE07bhg4c10u:1155: baladevaḥ : chalatāṃ mitho vañcanāṃ kurvatāṃ sambandhi dyūtaṃ sarvasva-haram akṣadevanādy aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1162: sattvavatām balināṃ sambandhī sattvaṃ balam aham //36//
GE07bhg4c10u:1165: munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c10u:1170: kavīnāṃ krānta-darśinām uśanā nāma kaviḥ śukraḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c10u:1172: sākṣād īśvarasyāpi vibhūti-madhye pāṭhas tena rūpeṇa cintanārtha iti prāg evoktam /
GE07bhg4c10u:1173: vṛṣṇīnāṃ madhye vāsudevo vasudeva-putratvena prasiddhas tvad-upadeṣṭāyam aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1174: tathā pāṇḍavānāṃ madhye dhanañjayas tvam evāham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1176: kavīnāṃ krānta-darśināṃ sūkṣmārtha-vivekināṃ madhye uśanā kavir iti khyātaḥ śukro 'ham//37//
GE07bhg4c10u:1178: vṛṣṇīnāṃ madhye vāsudevo vasudevo mat-pitā mad-vibhūtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1179: prajñāditvāt svārthiko 'ṇ [Pāṇ 5.4.38] vṛṣṇīnām aham evāsmi ity anukter asyānyārthatā neṣṭā //37//
GE07bhg4c10u:1180: baladevaḥ : vṛṣṇīnāṃ madhye vāsudevo vasudeva-putraḥ saṅkarṣaṇo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1181: na ca vāsudevaḥ kṛṣṇo 'ham iti vyākhyeyaṃ tasya svayaṃrūpasya vibhūtitvāyogāt /
GE07bhg4c10u:1182: mahat-sraṣṭādīnāṃ vāmana-kapilādīnāṃ ca sākṣād īśvaratve 'pi vibhūtitvenoktiḥ svāṃśāvatāratvāt tena rūpeṇa cintyatva-vivakṣayā vā yujyate /
GE07bhg4c10u:1184: pāṇḍavānāṃ madhye dhanañjayas tvam aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1191: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām /
GE07bhg4c10u:1192: maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham //38//
GE07bhg4c10u:1195: yenāsaṃyatā api saṃyatā bhavanti sa daṇḍo mad-vibhūtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1196: jetum icchatāṃ sambandhinī sāmād apy upāya-rūpā nītir asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1197: guhyānāṃ gopyānāṃ gopana-hetu-maunam avacanam aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1199: jñānavatāṃ tattva-jñānināṃ yaj jñānam tad aham asmi //38//
GE07bhg4c10u:1201: damayatām adāntān utpathān pathi pravartayatām utpatha-pravṛttau nigraha-hetur daṇḍo 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1202: jigīṣatāṃ jetum icchatāṃ nītir nyāyo jayopāyasya prakāśako 'ham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1203: guhyānāṃ gopyānāṃ gopana-hetur maunaṃ vācaṃ-yamatvam aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1205: guhyānāṃ gopyānāṃ madhye sa-saṃnyāsa-śravaṇa-manana-pūrvakam ātmano nididhyāsana-lakṣaṇaṃ maunaṃ vāham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1206: jñānavatāṃ jñānināṃ yac-chravaṇa-manana-nididhyāsana-paripāka-prabhavam advitīyātma-sākṣātkāra-rūpaṃ sarvājñāna-virodhi jñānaṃ tad aham asmi
GE07bhg4c10u:1210: yenotpathagāḥ sat-pathe caranti sa daṇḍo mad-vibhūtir ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1211: jigīṣatāṃ jetum icchatāṃ sambandhinī nītir nyāyo 'ham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1215: yac cāpi sarva-bhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna /
GE07bhg4c10u:1216: na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram //39//
GE07bhg4c10u:1218: yad api ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ tad aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1219: tatra hetuḥ -mayā vinā yat syād bhavet tac caram acaraṃ vā bhūtaṃ nāsty eveti //39//
GE07bhg4c10u:1221: yad api ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ bījaṃ tan-māyopādhikaṃ caitanyam aham eva /
GE07bhg4c10u:1223: mayā vinā yat syād bhave caram acaraṃ vā bhūtaṃ vastu tan nāsty eva yataḥ sarvaṃ mat-kāryam evety arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c10u:1225: bījaṃ prarohakāraṇaṃ yat tad aham asmi /
GE07bhg4c10u:1226: tatra hetuḥ -- mayā vinā yat syāt caram acaraṃ vā tan naivāsti mithyaivety arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c10u:1227: baladevaḥ : yac ca sarva-bhūtānāṃ bījaṃ praroha-kāraṇaṃ tad apy aham /
GE07bhg4c10u:1229: mayā sarva-śaktimatāṃ pareśena vinā yac caram acaraṃ ca bhūtaṃ tattvaṃ syāt tan nāsti mṛṣaivety arthaḥ //39//
GE07bhg4c10u:1232: eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā //40//
GE07bhg4c10u:1234: anantatvād vibhūtīnāṃ tāḥ sākalyena vaktuṃ na śakyate /
GE07bhg4c10u:1235: eṣa tu vibhūti-vistara uddeśata saṅkṣepataḥ proktaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c10u:1238: he parantapa pareṣāṃ śatrūṇāṃ kāma-krodhya-lobhādīnāṃ tāpa-janaka /
GE07bhg4c10u:1239: mama divyānāṃ vibhūtīnām anta iyattā nāsti /
GE07bhg4c10u:1240: ataḥ sarvajñenāpi sā na śakyate jñātuṃ vaktuṃ vā san-mātra-viṣayatvāt sarvajñatāyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c10u:1241: eṣa tu tvāṃ pratyuddeśata eka-deśena prokto vibhūter vistaro vistāro mayā //40//
GE07bhg4c10u:1243: prakaraṇam upasaṃharati nānto 'stīti eṣa tu vistaro bāhulyam uddeśato nāma-mātrata eva kṛtaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c10u:1245: vistaro vistāra uddeśata eka-deśata eka-deśena proktaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c10u:1247: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā /

GE07bhg4c10u:1263: anuktā api traikālikīr vibhūtīḥ saṅgrahītum āha yad yad iti /

GE07bhg4c10u:1268: śrīmat saundaryeṇa sampattyā vā yuktam ūrjitaṃ balena yuktaṃ vā yad yat sattvaṃ vastu bhavati,
GE07bhg4c10u:1269: tat tad eva mama tejo 'ṃśena śakti-leśena sambhavaṃ siddham avagaccha pratīhīti svāyattatva-svavyāpyatvābhyāṃ
GE07bhg4c10u:1270: sarve 'bheda-nirdeśā nītā vāmanādīnāṃ tan-nirdeśās tu saṅgamitāḥ santi //41 //
GE07bhg4c10u:1272: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna /

GE07bhg4c10u:1278: mad-vyatiriktaṃ kiṃcid asti pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripādayāmṛtaṃ divi [Rv 8.4.17.3] iti śruteḥ /

GE07bhg4c10u:1280: indriya-dvārataś citte bahir dhāvati saty api /

GE07bhg4c10u:1294: āsvādya mādyati muhur madhubhin mano me //

GE07bhg4c10u:1299: ekāṃśenaikenaivāṃśena prakṛty-antaryāminā puruṣa-rūpeṇaivedaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ jagad viṣṭabhyādhiṣṭhānatvād vidhṛtyādhiṣṭhātṛtvād adhiṣṭhāya /
